pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for.
forbiddenDesc: Sorry, but you don't have permission to access this page.
internalErrorDesc: Sorry, but the server encountered an error.
offlineErrorDesc: Sorry, can't connect to the internet. Check your connection.
sureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?

http.requestTimeout: The request timed out. Please try again later.
http.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
http.badRequest: Bad Request. Please check your input and try again.
http.unauthorized: Unauthorized. Please log in to continue.
http.forbidden: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource.
http.notFound: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found.
http.internalServerError: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
http.rolePermisstionsUpdate: The role permissions of the current account have been updated. Please log in again.
http.loginOtherDevice: Login again on another device, please login again.
http.errMsg401: The user does not have permission (token, user name, password error)!
http.errMsg403: The user is authorized, but access is forbidden!
http.errMsg404: Network request error, the resource was not found!
http.errMsg405: Network request error, request method not allowed!
http.errMsg500: Server error, please contact the administrator!
http.errMsg503: The service is unavailable, the server is temporarily overloaded or maintained!
http.errMsg505: The http version does not support the request!
